Learn to make cold porcelain, a super strong clay you can use to make models for all your miniature 28mm tabletop games such as Dungeons and Dragons and Pathfinder. This easy clay recipe is the perfect crafting materiel. it is super strong and air drys so no extra steps are needed. The materials to craft the clay are also cheap and easy to obtain so this project wonâ€™t break your budget. Bring a few crafting supplies and sit down with DM Scotty to begin your DIY crafting adventure. You can find the tools you need at my website ( http://www.thedmscraft.com/ ).
